title: Convert an Angular CLI project from Karma to Jest

examples.description: Convert the Angular CLI project `myapp` from Karma to Jest

project.description: The name of the project to convert.

convertIndentationRules.description: Whether or not rules relating purely to indentation (code formatting) should be converted. It is strongly encouraged to switch to https://prettier.io instead.

removeKarmaIfNoMoreKarmaTargets.description: If this conversion leaves no more Karma usage in the workspace, it will remove Karma and related dependencies and configuration
removeKarmaIfNoMoreKarmaTargets.x-prompt: Would you like to remove Karma and its related config if there are no Karma projects remaining after this conversion?

ignoreExistingKarmaConfig.description: If true we will not use existing Karma config as a reference, we will just reset the project with the latest recommended Jest config
ignoreExistingKarmaConfig.x-prompt: Would you like to ignore the existing Karma config? Recommended if the Karma config has not been altered much as it makes the new Jest config cleaner.
